name: MyCrystalBall
0:
”Alexa, ask My Crystal Ball if I am going to be rich.”
”Alexa, ask My Crystal Ball if it will snow today.”
”Alexa, ask My Crystal Ball if Holly will win the lottery.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my crystal ball
des: This is meant to be a fun skill, where you can ask your very own Crystal Ball any yes/no question and it will give you the "right" answer.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
